comment: Dr. Scherrer is terrible. She grades overly too hard and nitpicks everything on exams, they are not well created being unclear at times and sometimes too long you run out of time. Her practice exams are way easier than the actual. She takes attendence which is unnecessary and accuses people of wrongdoing. Don't want her again...
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: She's a very kind, caring lady. Trust me, if you show up to every class, you will get an A. She grades attendance, so be sure to go to class. All quizzes are online, open book, 5 questions each (I recommend doing them all in one go). NO TESTS AND NO FINAL. Take the term project seriously. She makes sure everyone is on track throughout college.

She is the BEST professor ever! She really cares about you, she want you to do great in the class. Very informative and smart when teaching the class. I will take her again with no doubt. Just do your homework, study the power points and you will get an A.
She gives extra credit and gives good feedback. Very informative in lecture. Great professor!

Dr. Scherrer is one of the few gems in IET and really cares about her students and their success. Highly(!!) recommend for online as her coursework is VERY organized (true industrial, eh?). You learn lots from weekly speakers even if you aren't interested in supply chain. Only one paper and she grades it quite easy, thankfully. Take her!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Tough grader. Says the group did good on a paper but then fails us. No point in buying the book because it is useless when she teaches. Super uptight when it comes to exam, the new testing software for online students is a total drag. Majority comes from online lectures which barely anyone can hear and understand. Never want to take her again...

Prof. Scherrer brings some great things to the IET major. She encourages engagement with current IE professionals and businesses. She motivates interest in the topic and takes a great interest in her students. She challenges you in the right way and helps you learn. Other teachers should take note!

Class is structured so you review material before it is covered so class time can be dedicated to answering questions. Material can be hard but she does her best to make sure no one is left behind. Keep up with classwork and you will be fine.

Relatively easy class, although concepts and methods aren't always the easiest to grasp. Goes over examples in class. Quizzes and tests are a bit tough, and beware of  the supply chain game projects, which are very involved and somewhat difficult unless you have a mastery of the material.
Great Professor!! Her lectures are straightforward, and she is very fair. Would definitely take again.
Very nice prof will help you as much as possible, Passed with a D becasue the tests are so hard. But helpfull

This teacher is amazing, I would recommend her to anyone. Class had online lectures, easy online quizzes and three tests on campus including final which you could use cheat sheets for. She is available almost all the time for help and responds to questions promptly. Awesome teacher!!
Great Teacher... Just do your work and discussions. Tests are fairly easy. You are allowed to have one page of notes

Great Prof! She will bend over backwards to help a student. Tests are not easy, but do the homework and you should be fine. Answers emails fast, easily one of the best profs I have ever had. Take her for statistics, she rocks!!

This teacher is amazing! She teaches well, as well as listens to her students. She always asks for feedback as to how she could improve her class and does so based on the recommendations. I have asked for help during all hours of the day and by various means (email, inperson, etc.) and see is almost always available. I strongly recommend her.

Had this women for IET logistics--the class lectures are BORING she practically reads the powerpoints to you-you feel its a waste of good class time. All tests are short answer questions (like 5 sentences) you have to rewrite what she expects or you are wrong! An AWFUL class...Be prepared to Bored and bring other homework to do in class.

This teacher is not easy, but she is extremely organized. You know exactly what to study, and what will be on her test. She also gives a note outline that you can add comments to when she lectures. The tests are directly from this note outline. She is extremely helpful and nice. I strongly recommend her.
